Provide simple email message body components: body

Source: R/emailing.R
stock_msg_body.Rd

The stock_msg_body() function simply provides some stock text for an email message sent via email_blast() or previewed through email_preview().

stock_msg_body()

Value

Text suitable for the msg_body arguments of email_blast() and email_preview().

Function ID

3-3

See also

Other Emailing: email_blast(), email_preview(), stock_msg_footer()
